Author: Stephenie Meyer

Author: J.K. Rowling
Description: A wizard hones his conjuring skills in the service of fighting evil.

Author: Rick Riordan

Author: Mark Haddon

Author: Jeannette Walls

Description: A man's obsession with the wilderness ends in tragedy.

Author: George RR Martin
Description: The second book in the Song of Ice and Fire series. Read by Roy Dotrice. 37 hours, 12 minutes unabridged.

Description: How and why certain products and ideas become fads.

Title: PERCY JACKSON & THE OLYMPIANS
Author: Rick Riordan
Description: A boy battles mythological monsters.

Author: PC Cast and Kristin Cast

Author: Jon Krakauer

Author: Sophie Kinsella

Author: James Patterson

Title: The Prince of Tides: A Novel
Author: Pat Conroy

Description: Light Yagami discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to murder anyone he has seen by writing their name in it. He uses this ability to try to rid the world of evil.

Title: A PEOPLE'S HISTORY OF THE UNITED STATES: 1492 TO PRESENT
Author: Howard Zinn

Author: David McCullough

Author: Eckhart Tolle

Title: THE GUARDIAN

Title: THE WEDDING
Author: Nicholas Sparks

Title: THE YEAR OF MAGICAL THINKING

Title: Year of Wonders: A Novel of the Plague
Author: Geraldine Brooks

Title: FABLEHAVEN
Author: Brandon Mull
Description: Evil is afoot in magical creatures' haven.

Author: Jacquelyn Mitchard

Author: Amy Tan

Title: MAXIMUM RIDE
Author: James Patterson
Description: Winged children try to save the world.

Title: DEAD WITCH WALKING

Author: Ron Chernow

Author: Sarah Dunant

Author: Dante Alighieri

Title: MAXIMUM RIDE
Author: James Patterson
Description: Winged children try to save the world.

Title: NOTES FROM A SMALL ISLAND
Author: Bill Bryson
Description: An affectionate and irreverent walking tour of Britain. Originally published in 1996.

Title: Drowning Ruth: A Novel (Oprah's Book Club)
